mapper.sql: vndr_no, chng_hist_seq, chng_field, chng_field_name, chng_before_field_value, chng_after_field_value, note_text, rgster_no, rgst_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.vendor.repository.master.VdVendorChangeHistoryDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE vd_vendor_change_history
vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chng_hist_seq = #{chngHistSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
chng_field = #{chngField, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chng_field_name = #{chngFieldName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chng_before_field_value = #{chngBeforeFieldValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chng_after_field_value = #{chngAfterFieldValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note_text = #{noteText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE chng_hist_seq = #{chngHistSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
